record.title: GENERAL LEAVE
record.narrative:
GENERAL LEAVE -- (House of Representatives - July 12, 2007)

[Page: H7726]

speaking.paragraph: Mr. Speaker, I ask unanimous consent that all Members have 5 legislative days in which to revise and extend their remarks on H.R. 1851 and insert extraneous material thereon.

record.chair: Is there objection to the request of the gentlewoman from California?
